<title level="1" right="Rules">[Artifact Rules](/Rules.aspx?ID=3231)</title>

**Source** [GM Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=218) pg. 300 <sup>2.0</sup>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">
Every artifact is an item with the [artifact](/Traits.aspx?ID=537) trait. This trait means two things: the item can’t be crafted or have its runes adjusted by normal means, and it can’t be damaged by normal means. Artifacts are always [rare](/Traits.aspx?ID=683) or [unique](/Traits.aspx?ID=723). The ones found here are all 20th level or higher, which is typical for artifacts. The other rules for wearing or using the item still apply.
</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
